Enable: Message to be displayed to customer when "Single Order Top Amount" condition limit is triggered. Defaults to "No single order allowed with amount over %s.". Please use "%s" to position the amount value within the message string.
启用: 当“单笔订单最高金额”超过时，显示给用户的消息。默认是“单笔订单金额不允许超过%s”。请使用“%s”来代替消息中的金额值。

Enable: No single order can be placed over X amount, where X is an integer value which defaults to 1500.
启用: 单笔订单金额不能超过X，X是一个默认值为1500的整数值。

Enable: Send notification email to "Notification TO emails" when order reaches amount of AMOUNT >= X. Where X is a integer value like 600. Default value for this field is 600.
启用: 当订单金额不低于X时，发送通知邮件给“通知邮件接收地址”。这里的X是一个如600的整数值，默认值为600。
单笔订单最高金额消息

Enable: Single or multiple emails in a following form "Firstname Lastname <email>", like "Branko Ajzele <ajzele@gmail.net>", without quotation marks. In case of multiple entries, each entry goes on separate line.
启用: 单个或多个“姓名<邮件地址>”格式的邮件地址，如“Branko Ajzele <ajzele@gmail.net>”，不包括引号。在多个邮件地址的情况下，一个邮件地址占一行。
订单金额通知邮件模板
